content.raw: Jokes aside, a suggestion for the future regarding models which have the same texture repeated on all faces, is to use a box geometry and a texture containing one single number. We get the same effect without the extra DAE files. See the [textured_shapes](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/src/8806fb2509dcf7697f8600988e56fe3277cffa8a/textured_shapes/model.sdf?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#model.sdf-5) model for example.
content.html: Jokes aside, a suggestion for the future regarding models which have the same texture repeated on all faces, is to use a box geometry and a texture containing one single number. We get the same effect without the extra DAE files. See the textured_shapes model for example.
